15.1.2 Makers for Heroes
We have been partnering with Restart 
for over five years. Through its 
“Makers for Heroes” initiative, the 
non-profit organization develops creative solutions for wounded Israeli and foreign veterans to help them 
overcome their daily challenges. In 
working with Stratasys, the 
organization approaches us with a 
particular challenge, and a team of 
employee volunteers comes up with a solution via our cutting-edge 3D printing technologies. 
Stratasys Volunteers for Makers for Heroes 2020
Stratasys Volunteers for Makers for Heroes 2021
